column4: the pizza came. We had the classic sausage and the pepperoni
column5: and the sausage was by far my favorite. A gigantic wheel of solid sausage was surrounded by cheese on all sides
column6: and had a crust that was far crunchier than I expected. I did cut the first few slices knife and fork style
column7: but the rest I was able to pick and eat like normal.
